actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5146 of the Revised Statutes with respect to the qualifications of directors of national banks.

summary.text: Revises qualifications for directors of national banks by permitting a person to serve as a director if such person owns a specified number of shares in any company which has control over such bank.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5146 of the Revised Statutes with respect to the qualifications of directors of national banks.
